definition: a blood soaked and hard-fought struggle (idiom)

sentences.english: After eight years of fighting, the Chinese people at lastdefeated the Japanese invaders.
sentences.chinese: 經過八年浴血奮戰，中國人民終於打敗了日本侵略者。

sentences.english: Characterization of the North China People's support and the people's Liberation Army to fight a bloody battle scenes.
sentences.chinese: 刻畫了華北人民支前和人民解放軍浴血奮戰的場景。

sentences.english: Many soldiers fight hard in bloody battles to guard the border.
sentences.chinese: 爲保衛祖國的邊境，許多戰士浴血疆埸。

sentences.english: Do any of you know the movie called ? The Treasure of the Sierra Madre?
sentences.chinese: 你們有人看過一部叫，《浴血金沙》的電影嗎？

sentences.english: Southern Sudanese had fought a long, bloody war to win independence.
sentences.chinese: 南部蘇丹人民爲了贏得獨立，經歷了長期的浴血奮戰。

sentences.english: I watched another English movie which was called THE EXPENDABLES tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今夜，我看了一部片名叫《浴血任務》的英語電影。

definition: a blood soaked and hard-fought struggle (idiom)
to fight with all one's might
bravery with no thought of personal safety (idiom); risking life and limb/undaunted by perils
to go all out for sth at risk of one's life
dauntless/to summon up courage and determination/using extreme force of will
